sentences.en: " But there's a way out: what is vulgarly known as'jumping the manger.'
sentences.cn: -- “ 不过,有个办法: 粗话所谓 ‘ 跳槽 ’.

sentences.en: Cooperate with Procurement Manger to manage the departmental daily routine.
sentences.cn: 协助项目采购经理管理部门的日常事务.

sentences.en: He ask the manger's permission to take a day off.
sentences.cn: 他请求经理批准他一天假.

sentences.en: He is wrapped in cloth and is lying a manger.
sentences.cn: 婴孩用布包着,放在马槽上.

sentences.en: He was born in humble surroundings and laid a manger.
sentences.cn: 他出生于卑微的环境里,被放入马厩中.

sentences.en: The General Manger will attend all Board meetings as a non - voting observer.
sentences.cn: 总经理须作为无投票权的观察员参与所有的董事会.

sentences.en: The horse is tied up to the manger.
The horses were crunching their straw at their manger.
sentences.cn: 这些马在嘎吱嘎吱地吃槽里的草.

sentences.en: The man to another and was shown into the manger's room.
sentences.cn: 这人去了另一家保险公司,被带进了经理室.

sentences.en: The manger dropped in unannounced at the office several times a week.
sentences.cn: 经理每星期都不经事先通知到办公室来几次.

sentences.en: The manger in charge of mangement and reports to board of directors.
sentences.cn: 总经理负责整个公司的经营并向董事会汇报工作.

sentences.en: The manger was defeated in the Contest of Family Sports.
sentences.cn: 经理在家庭运动竞赛上失败了.

sentences.en: The moment my back is turned everything goes to rack and manger.
sentences.cn: 就在我转身的一瞬间,一切都陷入毁灭之境.

sentences.en: They found Him in a manger where oxen feed on hay.
sentences.cn: 他们发现他在牛槽里,就是牛群吃草的地方.

sentences.en: What? That kid is the manger's son? How cute!
sentences.cn: 什么? 那是经理的儿子? 真可爱!

phrases.tran_cn: 自己不能享用也不让他人享用的人

trans.tran_cn: （动物的等）食槽，占马槽的狗，占着茅坑不拉屎的人，槽子
trans.tran_en: a long open container that horses, cattle etc eat from
